title: nimmatiyAna nenjinilE
sahitya:
nimmatiyAna nenjinilE nidam ninaiyEnO ninaiyE paramporuLE


anupallavi

  vemmati seyyum vEdanaiyinri vIN mana mAya shOdanai inriyE


caraNam    ponmaya aruNap punnagai pUtta pUraNa vAn pOlE
pUngkuyil kUvum tIngkani shOlai polidiru azhaginaip-pOlE
nanmaiyin uruvE cinmaya guruvE nava ratnAngita naTana sabEshanE
